titleStmt.title: Newcastle upon Tyne, Sept. 26th 1670 At a court held in the Guildhall, within the town of Newcastle upon Tyne, by custome (time out of mind) for conservation of the River of Tyne, the 26th day of September, anno dom. 1670. Before Tho. Davison Esquire, Mayor; Sir Robert Shafto Knight, recorder, and several of the aldermen of the said town.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
